trans-unit.resname: TSP·274 | Gemstone Caverns | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gemstone Caverns
trans-unit.target: 宝石洞穴

trans-unit.resname: TSP·274 | Gemstone Caverns | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME is in your opening hand and you're not the starting player, you may begin the game with CARDNAME on the battlefield with a luck counter on it. If you do, exile a card from your hand.
trans-unit.target: 若你起手的手牌包含了阿格拉隆德的晶辉洞，且你不是先手牌手，则你可以让阿格拉隆德的晶辉洞在战场上来开始游戏，且上面有一个运气指示物。如果你如此作，则从你手上放逐一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: TSP·274 | Gemstone Caverns | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}. If CARDNAME has a luck counter on it, instead add one mana of any color.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。如果阿格拉隆德的晶辉洞上有运气指示物，则改为加一点任意颜色的法术力。
